content: The Snout Mask is obtained upon defeating the boar man in Fright Cliff - Rockrest Flat in Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge after handing him the Sobering Stone, Jade Lotus"), and Arhat Gold Piece.

The Snout Mask is obtained upon defeating the boar man in Fright Cliff - Rockrest Flat in Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge after handing him the Sobering Stone, Jade Lotus"), and Arhat Gold Piece.
